titleStmt.title: For the magistrates & other officers in Huntingtonshire who have been concern'd in the spoiling the goods of the innocent who meet together in obedience to the requirings of the good spirit of the Lord to worship him in his own way
titleStmt.author: Hardmeat, Tobias, d. 1703.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
